detaileddescription.para: Holds a pointer to the next newtwork adatper address or ``null`` if this is the last address.
Holds address of the network adapter as `io.SocketAddress`. ``m_port`` field of the address should obviously be ignored.

The length, in bits, of the prefix or network part of the IP address. For a unicast IPv4 address, any value greater than 32 is an illegal value. For a unicast IPv6 address, any value greater than 128 is an illegal value.

briefdescription.para: This struct holds information about single address of the network adapter.

detaileddescription.para: A list of network adapter addresses is part of network adapter description stored in `io.NetworkAdapterDesc`.
